data.name: Uragun Demo
data.detailed_description:
Take control of a friendly-but-deadly Mech unit. Face endless hordes of corrupted machines, gear up, and improvise your way out of trouble in this action-packed, futuristic top-down shooter.

Content of the demo:
- tutorial
- 4 missions across 2 different biomes
- lots of explosions!
data.about_the_game:
Take control of a friendly-but-deadly Mech unit. Face endless hordes of corrupted machines, gear up, and improvise your way out of trouble in this action-packed, futuristic top-down shooter.

Content of the demo:
- tutorial
- 4 missions across 2 different biomes
- lots of explosions!
data.short_description: Take control of a friendly-but-deadly Mech unit. Face endless hordes of corrupted machines, gear up, and improvise your way out of trouble in this action-packed, futuristic top-down shooter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10 20H2
  • Processor: Intel 7th gen i5 or AMD Ryzen 1700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10 20H2
  • Processor: Intel 10th gen i7 or AMD Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
